name: Project Nikko , "Sci-Fi Getaway"
description:
Controls

Movement: WASD + Mouse

Interact: Left MouseClick

Exit: Alt+f4

This product is the 3rd out of 4 levels in a overarching story. In this part, the player has arrived at the high district for a seemingly simple drop-off mission. However, it turns out the hideout has been compromised.

This product was made as a collaboration between many members - not just by myself! This is simply the end result.
Created with Unreal Engine and with the goal to participate at the Norwegian Game Awards.

This game is voiced in Norwegian.
